name: TinyInput

autofocus.description: Native attributes, when the page loads, the focus is automatically obtained
autofocus.description_zh: 原生属性，页面加载时，自动获取焦点

autosize.description: Adaptive content height, only valid for type="textarea". Objects can be passed in, e.g., { minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }
autosize.description_zh: 自适应内容高度，只对 type="textarea" 有效。可传入对象，如，{ minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }

clearable.description: Whether to display a clear button, which does not apply to type="textarea"
clearable.description_zh: 是否显示清除按钮，该属性不适用于 type="textarea"

cols.description: Native property, which sets the width, is valid when type = "textarea".
cols.description_zh: 原生属性，设置宽度，在 type ="textarea" 时有效

counter.description: Whether or not to display the word count is only valid if type = "text" or type = "textarea".
counter.description_zh: 是否显示字数统计，只在 type = "text" 或 type = "textarea" 时有效

display-only-content.description: When the text content area is set to read-only, if it is not used, the value of modelVale will be used as the read-only text
display-only-content.description_zh: 设置只读态时的文本内容区，如果没有则会使用 modelVale 的值作为只读文本

hover-expand.description: Setting the text field to be expanded/collapsed by mouse hover, only works for 'type=textarea', preferably with autosize
hover-expand.description_zh: 设置文本域鼠标悬浮展开/收起，只对 `type=textarea` 有效，最好搭配 autosize 一起使用

label.description: 等价于原生 input aria-label 属性
label.description_zh: 等价于原生 input aria-label 属性

mask.description: Mask function is enabled, and only takes effect in the disabled and display-only states
mask.description_zh: 启用掩码功能，只在 disabled 和 display-only 状态下生效

:max.description: Native attributes, set the maximum value

:maxlength.description_zh: 原生属性，最大输入长度

:memory-space.description: Set the addMemory method to the maximum number of entries that can be saved
:memory-space.description_zh: 设置 addMemory 方法中，最大能保存条目的数量

:min.description: Native attributes, set the minimum value

v-model.description: Sets the binding value for the text

name.description: 原生 input name 属性
name.description_zh: 原生 input name 属性

readonly.description: Native attributes, whether they are read-only

resize.description: Controls whether it can be scaled by the user
resize.description_zh: 控制是否能被用户缩放

:rows.description: Enter the number of lines in the box, which is valid only for type="textarea".
:rows.description_zh: 输入框行数，只对 type="textarea" 有效

show-password.description: Whether to display the switch password icon
show-password.description_zh: 是否显示切换密码图标

show-word-limit.description: Whether or not to display the input word count is only valid when type = "text" or type = "textarea".
show-word-limit.description_zh: 是否显示输入字数统计，只在 type = "text" 或 type = "textarea" 时有效

size.description: Enter the size of the box, which is only valid when type!="textarea".
size.description_zh: 输入框尺寸，只在 type!="textarea" 时有效

:step.description: Native property, which sets the legal numerical interval for the input field
:step.description_zh: 原生属性，设置输入字段的合法数字间隔

tabindex.description: Native property, the tabindex of the input box
tabindex.description_zh: 原生属性，输入框的 tabindex

type.description: Set the type property of the input box, which defaults to "text", and optionally values "text", "textarea", and the type values of other native inputs
type.description_zh: 设置 input 框的 type 属性，默认为 "text",可选值 "text"，"textarea" 和其他 原生 input 的 type 值

validate-event.description: Whether the validation of the form is triggered when input
validate-event.description_zh: 输入时是否触发表单的校验

events.name: blur
events.description_zh: 在 Input 失去焦点时触发

events.name: change
events.description: Triggers when the Input value changes
events.description_zh: 在 Input 值改变时触发

events.name: clear
events.description: Triggers when the Clear button generated by the clearable property is clicked
events.description_zh: 在点击由 clearable 属性生成的清空按钮时触发

events.name: focus
events.description_zh: 在 Input 获得焦点时触发

events.name: input
events.description: An event is triggered when a value is entered

methods.name: addMemory
methods.description_zh: 历史输入内容的记忆方法

methods.name: blur
methods.description: Makes the input out of focus

methods.name: select
methods.description_zh: 选中 input 中的文字

slots.name: append
slots.description: The content after the input box is only valid for type="text".
slots.description_zh: 输入框后置内容，只对 type="text" 有效

slots.name: prefix
slots.description: The content of the input box header is only valid for type="text".
slots.description_zh: 输入框头部内容，只对 type="text" 有效

slots.name: prepend
slots.description: The input box is preceded by the content, which is only valid for type="text".
slots.description_zh: 输入框前置内容，只对 type="text" 有效

slots.name: suffix
slots.description: The content at the end of the input box is only valid for type="text".
slots.description_zh: 输入框尾部内容，只对 type="text" 有效

description: 通过鼠标或键盘输入字符。
description_zh: 通过鼠标或键盘输入字符。
